text.title: part5_BDSM as business: Interviews with Dominatrixes

p.s: It ’s really rare you get people saying that .
I ’m still high from the session , because of that conversation we had and he thinks this is going to make him a better person .

hi.s: That you are going to help him .

p.s:
Yeah , because
he
feels that way .
I do n’t know if this type of thing…it definitely would n’t help everybody out there , but it helps some people .

s.hi: DS : The people who see you , it does help them .

p.s: Well , yeah , you know , for some people it is just a means to an end — it ’s the only way they can get off , or whatever .
I do n’t judge anyone .
But I find it really fascinating , all the different types .

s.hi: DS : Are they typically embarrassed when they first start coming in here ?

p.s: Some are , and some are n’t .
Yeah , some are and some are n’t .

s.hi: DS : Depending on their experience or their comfort level ?

p.s: I think it depends on how people have reacted to them in the past , as you can imagine .
Like the guy I was seeing .
He was originally very nervous .
Yeah , he was probably embarrassed .
We ’ve had a few people come in , get nervous , and are like , “ I…I…I do n’t know what I should say , or what I can tell you . ”

s.hi: DS : How do you make them feel comfortable ?

p.s: Yeah , sometimes they are like , “ Oh , this might sound weird … ” and I ’m like , “ Trust me , it does n’t sound weird ! ”
Not to make them feel like they are one of a thousand .
I try to let them know that I appreciate their being honest with me , and I find it interesting .

s.hi: DS : What do you think in your own histories has made you so non-judgmental ?

p.s: Well , that would be getting into personal information I would n’t want to talk about .
Yeah .
You ca n’t be judgmental in this industry .
You have to be open-minded .

s.hi:
DS : Alex , do people ever come in with fantasies that are
Iraq War
-related .

p.s: I have n’t .
I ’ve had some like that .

There have been a few fetishes that are racial play , or war related .
Nazis
.
People come here with things to work out .
Maybe they ’ve been traumatized or maybe they have some issue .
They come here with things .
I have n’t run into anyone , but I would n’t be surprised .
Yeah .

I have
definitely
seen vets before , I know I have .

s.hi: DS : So you were saying you have war-related ?

p.s: I ’m not sure how it develops with an individual .
But usually the request is a specific type of role play , like I am the German Nazi and this is the Jew and I have to punish him in some sense .
